data.eml:eml: Discovery of the worker caste and descriptions of two new species of Anomalomyrma (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Leptanillinae) with unique abdominal morphology

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Borowiec, Marek L., Schulz, Andreas, Alpert, Gary D., Baňař, Petr (2011): Discovery of the worker caste and descriptions of two new species of Anomalomyrma (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Leptanillinae) with unique abdominal morphology. Zootaxa 2810: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277114
